metadata.title: CVE-2024-50612 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
libsndfile through 1.2.2 has an ogg_vorbis.c vorbis_analysis_wroteout-of-bounds read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-50612` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.3+esm4
sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.3+esm4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.3+esm4').
